languages.text: {n}Клеменциа на секунду прикрывает глаза, поддавшись накопившейся усталости.{/n} "Силы обороны на исходе, Ваша Светлость. Мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}слишком долго{/d} ведем войну на истощение без возможности получить поддержку извне. Молю Императора, что ваше прибытие позволит переломить ход всей операции".

{n}Clementia closes her eyes for a second, giving in to the overwhelming exhaustion.{/n} "The PDF is on its last legs, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We've been waging a war of attrition for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}too long{/d}, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."
languages.original_text: {n}Клеменциа на секунду прикрывает глаза, поддавшись накопившейся усталости.{/n} "Силы обороны на исходе, Ваша Светлость. Мы {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}слишком долго{/d} ведем войну на истощение без возможности получить поддержку извне. Молю Императора, что ваше прибытие позволит переломить ход всей операции".

We've been waging a war of attrition for too long, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

We've been waging a war of attrition for too long, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

{n}Clementia closes her eyes for a second, giving in to the overwhelming exhaustion.{/n} "The PDF is on its last legs, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We've been waging a war of attrition for too long, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

languages.text: {n}クレメンティアは一瞬だけ目を閉じて、襲い掛かる疲労感に身を任せた。{/n}「惑星防衛軍は限界に達しています、陛下。外部からの支援の見込みもないまま、あまりにも{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}長い間{/d}、消耗戦を続けてきました。陛下のご帰還がこの作戦の流れを変えてくれることを皇帝に祈ります」
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia closes her eyes for a second, giving in to the overwhelming exhaustion.{/n} "The PDF is on its last legs, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We've been waging a war of attrition for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}too long{/d}, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}クレメンティアは一瞬だけ目を閉じて、襲い掛かる疲労感に身を任せた。{/n}「惑星防衛軍は限界に達しています、陛下。外部からの支援の見込みもないまま、あまりにも{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}長い間{/d}、消耗戦を続けてきました。陛下のご帰還がこの作戦の流れを変えてくれることを皇帝に祈ります」

languages.text: {n}克莱门缇雅闭上双眼休息片刻，她几乎要被沉重的疲惫压垮了。{/n}“行星防御部队已经是强弩之末了，大人。这场漫长的消耗战持续了{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}太久太久{/d}，我们没有得到任何外来支援。我向神皇祈祷，希望您的到来能够扭转战局。”
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia closes her eyes for a second, giving in to the overwhelming exhaustion.{/n} "The PDF is on its last legs, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We've been waging a war of attrition for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}too long{/d}, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱门缇雅闭上双眼休息片刻，她几乎要被沉重的疲惫压垮了。{/n}“行星防御部队已经是强弩之末了，大人。这场漫长的消耗战持续了太久太久，我们没有得到任何外来支援。我向神皇祈祷，希望您的到来能够扭转战局。”

languages.text: {n}Clementia cierra los ojos por un momento, cediendo a su monumental cansancio.{/n} «Las FDP están en las últimas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hemos librado una guerra de desgaste durante {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}demasiado tiempo{/d} sin ayuda externa. Ruego al Emperador que su llegada cambie las tornas de la operación».
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia closes her eyes for a second, giving in to the overwhelming exhaustion.{/n} "The PDF is on its last legs, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We've been waging a war of attrition for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}too long{/d}, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia cierra los ojos por un momento, cediendo a su monumental cansancio.{/n} «Las FDP están en las últimas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hemos librado una guerra de desgaste durante demasiado tiempo sin ayuda externa. Ruego al Emperador que su llegada cambie las tornas de la operación».

languages.text: {n}Clémentia ferme les yeux un instant, terrassée par une vague d'épuisement.{/n} « Les Forces de Défense Planétaire sont à bout, Votre Seigneurie. Nous menons une guerre d'usure depuis {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}trop longtemps{/d}, sans recevoir le moindre soutien extérieur. Je prie l'Empereur pour que votre arrivée parvienne à renverser le cours de la bataille. »
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia closes her eyes for a second, giving in to the overwhelming exhaustion.{/n} "The PDF is on its last legs, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We've been waging a war of attrition for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}too long{/d}, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clémentia ferme les yeux un instant, terrassée par une vague d'épuisement.{/n} « Les Forces de Défense Planétaire sont à bout, Votre Seigneurie. Nous menons une guerre d'usure depuis trop longtemps, sans recevoir le moindre soutien extérieur. Je prie l'Empereur pour que votre arrivée parvienne à renverser le cours de la bataille. »

languages.text: {n}Clementia schließt für eine Sekunde ihre Augen und gibt der überwältigenden Erschöpfung nach.{/n} "Die PVS können kaum noch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Dieser Zermürbungskrieg dauert schon {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}zu lange{/d}, und das ohne Chance auf Unterstützung von außen. Ich bete zum Imperator, dass Euer Eintreffen dieser Operation eine Kehrtwende beschert."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia closes her eyes for a second, giving in to the overwhelming exhaustion.{/n} "The PDF is on its last legs, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We've been waging a war of attrition for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}too long{/d}, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia schließt für eine Sekunde ihre Augen und gibt der überwältigenden Erschöpfung nach.{/n} "Die PVS können kaum noch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Dieser Zermürbungskrieg dauert schon zu lange, und das ohne Chance auf Unterstützung von außen. Ich bete zum Imperator, dass Euer Eintreffen dieser Operation eine Kehrtwende beschert."

languages.text: {n}Clementia, yorgunluktan bir müddet gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, GSK son demlerinde. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}Uzun süredir{/d} yıpratıcı bir harp veriyoruz ve bu harbi desteksiz sürdürdük. İmparator'dan tek dileğim, sizin gelişinizle savaşın gidişatının değişmesi."
languages.original_text: {n}Clementia closes her eyes for a second, giving in to the overwhelming exhaustion.{/n} "The PDF is on its last legs, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We've been waging a war of attrition for {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_DargonusLate}too long{/d}, without any chance of support from outside. I pray to the Emperor that your arrival will change the tide of this operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Clementia yorgunluktan bir müddet gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, GSK son demlerinde. Uzun süredir yıpratan bir harp içerisindeyiz ve bu harbi desteksiz sürdürüyoruz. İmparator’dan tek dileğim, sizin gelişinizle savaşın gidişatının değişmesi."
